review: Works the best for out of everything I use netflix on... however if my roommates would stop playing crossy road on it the up button wouldn't be becoming less responsive... but that is because that is what they do most of the day when they are home trying to beat each others records... love how simple the controller is for it. Nothing to be disappointed about at all!!!
author: Charity Spencer

review: It works as expected. The interface is quite a bit different than what I am used to but not hard to learn. I have had it freeze up a few times especially when watching SlingTelevision but that is more likely the service not the stick. Streaming Prime media is great, smooth and clear. Setup was easy and integration with Harmony Hub was covered as well. I have no complaints.
